name: Physical Inventory 5e
description:
Physical Inventory boards for D&D 5e

Included is the design and instructions and rules for making and using grid-based inventory boards, similar to games like Resident Evil 4, Diablo, and Deus Ex. Create magnetic dry-erase items that can be picked up, rearranged and customized.


Selling Points
  • Visual and Intuitive
  • Want to trade an item in your inventory? Pick it up and hand it to another player!
  • Make what you carry a meaningful part of the game
  • New encumbrance rules are simple and easy to engage with.
  • Rules for disguises make players carefully consider their options when in disguise

Required Materials
  • 11x14 Dry erase board
  • Magnetic sheets
  • Wet erase markers
  • Your local friendly print shop
